title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Fallout Over Epstein Files
summary: Trump's relationship with staunch ally Marjorie Taylor Greene fractured when she refused to follow his lead on releasing Jeffrey Epstein files. MTG claims Trump told her his 'friends will get hurt' if files are released. Trump withdrew endorsement, called her a 'traitor' and 'disgrace,' and vowed to support her primary challenger. MTG resigned from Congress in January 2026 citing this feud.
keyFacts: MTG co-sponsored Epstein Files Transparency Act to release all files related to Jeffrey Epstein
Trump told MTG that releasing the files would hurt his 'friends' according to MTG
Trump withdrew his endorsement of MTG, calling her a 'traitor' and 'disgrace to the Republican Party'
Trump announced he would support a primary challenger against MTG
MTG resigned from Congress in January 2026, citing the feud with Trump as a primary reason
MTG claimed Trump was 'protecting powerful people' connected to Epstein
Trump demanded loyalty over transparency regarding Epstein connections

MTG had been one of Trump's most vocal supporters before this disagreement
